content: largest hook size was a p 11 5mm on pattern *from crochet me website information on the 2nd yarn * > 1 ball of rowan s kid silk haze b in villian 25g per 229yds you could substitute another lightweight yarn easily in either a tonal or contrast color the gauge isn t crucial for the trim *from crochet me website information sizing * > pattern as written has a 36-inch dropped waist that stretches to 42 inches and can be tightened to 32 inches without looking odd you can add or remove a pattern repeat to change size 3 inches at a time details included in pattern
